name: height
description: Height of the SVG (number interpreted as px). Defaults to 80.

name: width
description: Width of the SVG (number interpreted as px). Defaults to 80.

name: color
description: Primary color applied to the rotating arc. Defaults to DEFAULT_COLOR.

name: strokeWidth
description: Stroke width of the rotating arc. Defaults to 2.

name: strokeWidthSecondary
description: Stroke width of the background circle. Uses strokeWidth if not provided.

name: secondaryColor
description: Color of the background circle. Defaults to DEFAULT_COLOR.

name: animationDuration
description: Duration of the rotation animation in seconds. Defaults to 1.

name: ariaLabel
description: Accessible label announced to screen readers. Defaults to 'oval-loading'.

name: wrapperStyle
description: Inline style object applied to the wrapper element.

name: wrapperClass
description: CSS class applied to the wrapper for custom styling.

name: visible
description: When false, the loader is not rendered. Defaults to true.
